posts.post_content:
Posted By: anthony
I know someone has one that they want to part with....so just send me scans of front and back and your price to tycobbfan1968@yahoo.com. this is 1 of my final 3 cards I need to complete my personal collection, then I'm moving on. I prefer graded but wont complain if its raw (unless it comes back fake from grading company) I will consider all grades and prices so go ahead and send me those scans!! I have a few cards I can throw in with cash but I'm ok with just cash too.
